body.p:
State of Indiana
Marion County SS

I John W, Ray, do solemnly Swear that I will well and truly Execute and perform all the duties of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in pursuance of the Statutes of Said State, by virtue of the Commission granted by His Excellency James F. Robinson Governor of Said State appointing me such Commissioner in the State of Indiana for the period of Four Years from the 25th day of July 1863, to the best of my ability.

So help me God
Jno W, Ray
Subscribed and sworn to before me, a Notary Public in & for said County this 29th day of July 1863

Witness my hand & Notarial seal
J. N. Phipps

State of Indiana
Marion County SS
I hereby certify the above to be a true, full and complete copy of the oath endorsed on the original Commission granted to said affiant John W. Ray
